data.name: Celestial Empire
data.detailed_description:
Buzz


About the Game


Play on one of the hand-crafted maps and visit the most beautiful regions of the Far East. Regardless of whether you prefer bamboo forests, coastal shores or snowy mountains, you will find a place for your community to grow. Every map offers different challenges which can play a role in your settlement's survival. Place buildings with many categories and functions, and then use the remaining space to decorate the city and make it even more magnificent. The game includes a system of seasons, thanks to which you will be able to observe how your settlement changes over time. Take advantage of the abundance of summer to prepare to survive the harsh winter.

Weather and a multitude of disasters will be your enemies. Taking care of a city comes with a set of disasters and unexpected obstacles. Droughts and floods may halt your production and leave your citizens stranded with no food or key resources. If you don’t calculate risks and prepare for the worst, locusts swarms, constant fires and epidemics will wreak havoc in your city. Your best chances of survival are gods’ blessings and perfectly designed resource chains.


Take care of the welfare of your citizens, meet their needs, make them happier and collect higher taxes. Create and optimize trade routes. As you develop, you will be able to trade with more and more landlords, which will increase the number of goods suppliers and unlock new ones. Take part in random events, make decisions, and shape the direction in which your settlement develops, while being mindful of harsh winters and inevitable disasters. Your citizens’ survival depends on your management and planning skills. You can build temples or tall pagodas to satisfy the Gods, who will reward you with unique bonuses.


We put a lot of heart into what we do and we want our game to be as good as possible. We have created aesthetic graphics, wonderful music and a decorated interface so that you can immerse yourself and seamlessly enjoy ancient China and all of its wonders. The game is designed with emotions and atmosphere in mind, so you won't be disappointed!

data.short_description: The Emperor has chosen you as a new provincial governor. It is now your duty to maintain peace and prosperity in the region. Design the city of your dreams, trade with other landlords and take care of your people’s needs. Ensure their survival through harsh winters and disasters ravaging the land.
data.supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Traditional Chinese, Polish, Simplified Chinese*, Italian, Korean, Portuguese, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Thai, Turkish
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7/8/8.1/10 64-bit
  • Processor: 3.2 GHz Dual Core Processor
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 970 or similar
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7/8/8.1/10 64-bit
  • Processor: 3.2 GHz Quad Core Processor
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RTX 2060 or similar
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 30 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

Minimum:
